javadoc: The VariableXRefFieldLocation class provides specific information about the variable's cross reference field within a program location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: index
params.comment: the index of the XREF (tells which XREF).

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the character position within the XREF.

methods.javadoc: Should only be used by XML restoration.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Should only be used by XML restoration.

methods.javadoc: Returns the index of the XREF in the list.
methods.name: getIndex
methods.comment: Returns the index of the XREF in the list.

methods.javadoc: Returns the reference address at this location.
methods.name: getReferenceAddress
methods.comment: Returns the reference address at this location.

methods.javadoc: Returns a String representation of this location.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a String representation of this location.

name: VariableXRefFieldLocation
comment:
The VariableXRefFieldLocation class provides specific information
 about the variable's cross reference field within a program location.
